subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Dominic Thiem persevered through five sets to defeat Ernests Gulbis, his friend, mentor and training partner, but was in no mood to celebrate after the victory.
snippet: Dominic Thiem persevered through five sets to defeat Ernests Gulbis, his friend, mentor and training partner, but was in no mood to celebrate after the victory.
